CKT_CUST_LOT_STATUS


Server validation rule of the table CUST_LOT狀態（自定義檔案）

%RULES%


Code preview of the table CUST_LOT狀態（自定義檔案）

use SCMES
go

if exists (select 1
from sysobjects
where id = object_id('cust_lot_status')
and type = 'U')
drop table cust_lot_status
go

use SCMES
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: cust_lot_status */
/*==============================================================*/
create table cust_lot_status (
create_time varchar(64) null,
create_user varchar(64) null,
last_modified varchar(64) null,
last_modify_user varchar(64) null,
bpm_state decimal(11) null,
ts varchar(64) null,
dr decimal(11) null,

code type_enum_val null,
name type_name null,
note type_memo null
)
go
